lithophane.title: Turn Your Memories into 3D Lithophanes
lithophane.description: A lithophane is a unique art form that transforms your photos into 3D sculptures that reveal the image when backlit. Create a truly special keepsake or gift.
lithophane.drag_drop: Drag & Drop here or click to select
lithophane.formats_supported: JPG, PNG and HEIC up to 10MB supported
lithophane.led_description: Includes an LED base that evenly illuminates your lithophane
lithophane.lithophane_description:
Lithophanes are a traditional art form dating back to the 19th century that have been given new life thanks to 3D printing technology. Each piece is unique, created from your personal photograph, with subtle gradations in thickness that allow light to pass through differently, revealing a stunning image when backlit.

These 3D printed lithophanes make exceptional gifts for special occasions like anniversaries, birthdays, weddings, or simply as a special way to honor cherished memories.
lithophane.drag_drop_image: Drag & Drop here or click to select
lithophane.image_requirements: JPG, PNG, GIF files up to 10MB supported

contact.contact_description: Have any questions? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.message_sent: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
contact.faq_description: Find quick answers to common questions about our 3D printing services.

file_formats.q: What file formats do you accept?
file_formats.a: We accept STL, OBJ, and 3MF files. STL is the most common and recommended format for best results with our printing process.

print_time.q: How long does it take to print my order?
print_time.a: Standard print times range from 1-5 business days depending on the size, complexity, and quantity of your order. Custom orders may take longer.

materials.q: What materials are available for printing?
materials.a: We offer a variety of materials including PLA, ABS, PETG, TPU, and special composites like wood-filled or carbon fiber blends.

shipping.a: Yes, we ship worldwide. International shipping costs and delivery times will be calculated at checkout.

design.q: Can you help me design a 3D model?
design.a: Yes! We offer design services for customers who have an idea but not a ready-made 3D model. Contact us to discuss your project.

return.a: Since 3D printed items are custom-made, we generally don't accept returns. However, if there's a quality issue with your order, please contact us within 7 days of receipt.

about.about_description: 3D PrintCraft is a pioneering 3D printing workshop dedicated to transforming digital ideas into tangible reality. We combine cutting-edge technology with artistic creativity to deliver exceptional 3D printed products for every need.
about.foundation: Our company was founded in 2018 by a team of passionate designers and engineers with a shared vision: to make 3D printing technology accessible to everyone. We started in a small workshop in Athens and, thanks to the support of our loyal customers, have grown into a fully-equipped studio with advanced 3D printers and talented staff.
about.growth: Since our founding, we have served thousands of satisfied customers, from individual creators and families to businesses and educational institutions. Every project, small or large, receives the same attention to detail and commitment to quality.
about.mission_statement: Our mission is to bring innovative ideas to life through 3D printing technology. We believe that every individual has creative potential, and we provide the tools, expertise, and support to unleash it. Whether you're a professional designer or simply have a great idea, we're here to help you make it a reality.
about.value_desc_innovation: We constantly explore new technologies and techniques to push the boundaries of what's possible in 3D printing.
about.value_desc_quality: We use only the highest quality materials and the most reliable printers to ensure that every creation stands the test of time.
about.value_desc_reliability: We meet deadlines, communicate clearly, and deliver what we promise, every time.
about.value_desc_craftsmanship: We combine technological expertise with artistic sensibility to create works of high aesthetics and functionality.
about.value_desc_passion: We love what we do, and it shows in the attention to detail and care we put into every project.
about.value_desc_community: We believe in the power of collaboration and actively support the local creative community through educational workshops and mentorship programs.
about.process_design_desc: We start with your vision and transform it into detailed 3D designs, either with the help of our experienced designers or by utilizing your own files.
about.process_material_desc: We recommend the appropriate materials for your project, from durable plastics and resins to composite materials with special properties.
about.process_printing_desc: We use advanced 3D printers to create your object with precision and consistency, carefully monitoring every stage of the process.
about.process_finishing_desc: We apply professional finishing techniques to perfect your object, including polishing, painting, and assembly.
about.process_delivery_desc: We carefully package your creation and deliver it to your door, with expedited shipping options for those in a hurry.
about.community_involvement: Beyond serving our customers, we take pride in contributing to the broader 3D printing community. We regularly host workshops and events to share our knowledge, collaborate with local schools for educational programs, and support innovative projects that use 3D printing for social benefit.
about.join_us_message: Are you passionate about 3D printing and innovation? We're always looking for talented individuals who share our vision. Visit our Careers page to see current job opportunities or send us your resume for future positions.
about.intro_text: 3D PrintCraft is a pioneering 3D printing workshop dedicated to transforming digital ideas into tangible reality.
about.foundation_text: Our company was founded in 2018 by a team of passionate designers and engineers with a shared vision: to make 3D printing technology accessible to everyone.
about.growth_text: Since our founding, we have served thousands of satisfied customers, from individual creators and families to businesses and educational institutions.
about.mission_text: Our mission is to bring innovative ideas to life through 3D printing technology.
about.values_description: These are the core values that guide our work and make us the best choice for your 3D printing needs.
about.innovation_text: We constantly explore new technologies and techniques to push the boundaries of what's possible in 3D printing.
about.quality_text: We use only the highest quality materials and the most reliable printers to ensure that every creation stands the test of time.
about.reliability_text: We meet deadlines, communicate clearly, and deliver what we promise, every time.
about.craftsmanship_text: We combine technological expertise with artistic sensibility to create works of high aesthetics and functionality.
about.passion_text: We love what we do, and it shows in the attention to detail and care we put into every project.
about.community_text: We believe in the power of collaboration and actively support the local creative community through educational workshops and mentorship programs.
about.process_description: From idea to final product, we work with precision and care at every step to ensure the result exceeds your expectations.
about.file_preparation_text: We optimize your 3D model for printing, fixing any issues and adjusting parameters for optimal results.
about.material_selection_text: We select the most suitable material for your project, considering usage, aesthetics, and mechanical properties.
about.precision_printing_text: We use high-resolution printers to create each object with precision, speed, and consistency.
about.quality_control_text: Every print undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure it meets our high standards before it's delivered to you.
about.cta_description: From personal keepsakes to professional prototypes, we're here to help you bring your vision to life.
